languages.text: "Вам дарована честь принимать у себя Вольного Торговца династии фон Валанциус. Потрудитесь соблюдать этикет при общении с высокородн{mf|ым|ой} предержател{mf|ем|ьницей} священного Патента".
"You have the honour of hosting the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. I urge you to follow proper etiquette when interacting with the eminent bearer of the sacred Warrant."
languages.original_text: "Вам дарована честь принимать у себя Вольного Торговца династии фон Валанциус. Потрудитесь соблюдать этикет при общении с высокородн{mf|ым|ой} предержател{mf|ем|ьницей} священного Патента".

traits.locale_text: "You have the honour of hosting the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. I urge you to follow proper etiquette when interacting with the eminent bearer of the sacred Warrant."
"You have the honour of hosting the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. I urge you to follow proper etiquette when interacting with the eminent bearer of the sacred Warrant."

"You have the honour of hosting the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. I urge you to follow proper etiquette when interacting with the eminent bearer of the sacred Warrant."

languages.text: "Ihr habt die Ehre, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} des Hauses von Valancius aufzunehmen. Ich lege Euch nahe, die Etikette zu wahren, wenn Ihr mit {mf|dem bedeutenden Träger|der bedeutenden Trägerin} des heiligen Handelsbriefs zu tun habt."
languages.original_text: "You have the honour of hosting the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. I urge you to follow proper etiquette when interacting with the eminent bearer of the sacred Warrant."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt die Ehre, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} des Hauses von Valancius aufzunehmen. Ich lege Euch nahe, die Etikette zu wahren, wenn Ihr mit {mf|dem bedeutenden Träger|der bedeutenden Trägerin} des heiligen Handelsbriefs zu tun habt."

languages.text: « Vous avez l'honneur d'accueillir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de la maison von Valancius. Je vous demanderai de respecter le protocole lorsque vous vous adressez à l'{mf|éminent détenteur|éminente détentrice} de la lettre de marque sacrée. »
languages.original_text: "You have the honour of hosting the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. I urge you to follow proper etiquette when interacting with the eminent bearer of the sacred Warrant."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez l'honneur d'accueillir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de la maison von Valancius. Je vous demanderai de respecter le protocole lorsque vous vous adressez à l'{mf|éminent détenteur|éminente détentrice} de la lettre de marque sacrée. »

languages.text: “你有幸接待了冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人。我请求你，在与神圣授状的持有者交流时，应当遵循适当的礼仪。”
languages.original_text: "You have the honour of hosting the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. I urge you to follow proper etiquette when interacting with the eminent bearer of the sacred Warrant."

traits.locale_text: “你有幸接待了冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人。我请求你，在与神圣许可证的持有者交流时，应当遵循适当的礼仪。”

languages.text: 「貴公らはフォン・ヴァランシウス家の自由開拓者をお迎えする栄誉にあずかった。高名なる聖なる礼状の持ち主に接する際は、適切な礼儀作法に従うよう要請します」
languages.original_text: "You have the honour of hosting the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. I urge you to follow proper etiquette when interacting with the eminent bearer of the sacred Warrant."

traits.locale_text: 「貴公らはフォン・ヴァランシウス家の自由開拓者をお迎えする栄誉にあずかった。高名なる聖なる礼状の持ち主に接する際は、適切な礼儀作法に従うよう要請する」

languages.text: «Tiene el honor de recibir {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente de la casa von Valancius. Le insto a que siga las normas de etiqueta apropiadas para dirigirse {mf|al eminente portador|a la eminente portadora} de la Patente sagrada».
languages.original_text: "You have the honour of hosting the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. I urge you to follow proper etiquette when interacting with the eminent bearer of the sacred Warrant."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene el honor de recibir {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente de la casa von Valancius. Le insto a que siga las normas de etiqueta apropiadas para dirigirse {mf|al eminente portador|a la eminente portadora} de la Patente sagrada».

languages.text: "Von Valancius Hanesi'nin Hür Taciri'ni ağırlama şerefine nailsiniz. Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin seçkin hamiliyle konuşurken gerekli adabımuaşereti göstermenizi salık veririm."
languages.original_text: "You have the honour of hosting the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius. I urge you to follow proper etiquette when interacting with the eminent bearer of the sacred Warrant."

traits.locale_text: "Von Valancius Hanesi'nin Hür Taciri'ni ağırlama onuruna nailsin. Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin seçkin hamili ile konuşurken nezaket kurallarına doğru bir şekilde uymanı tavsiye ediyorum."
